entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
